name: 24/7 Media
description: 24/7 Media creates the technology tools for business advantage in the digital age, offering our clients powerful and streamlined marketing solutions in a complex digital industry.

name: Accuen
description: Accuen is a digital media execution platform that provides holistic data management, audience modeling, and inventory procurement.

name: Adobe Audience Manager
description: Adobe® AudienceManager is a data management platform that consolidates audience information from all available sources. It identifies, quantifies, and optimizes high-value target audiences, which can then be offered to advertisers via an integrated, secure, privacy-friendly management system that works across all advertising distribution platforms.

name: AdRoll
description: AdRoll is a full-service display platform that provides retargeting, analytics, optimization, and enterprise solutions for advertisers.

name: AOL
description: AOL Advertising provides advertisers, agencies, and publishers with comprehensive and efficient online advertising tools.

name: AppNexus
description: AppNexus provides an open and customizable advertising technology platform to serve buyers and sellers of online advertising

name: Arcametrics
description: Arcametrics provides custom lookalike and branded category audiences to online advertisers, advertising agencies, and lead gen companies. We enable advertisers to improve display and video campaign performance by targeting highly optimized prospect audiences that mirror existing customers or converters.

name: Audience Science
description: AudienceScience helps advertisers manage their audience data and digital ad spend.

name: Bizo
description: Bizo's platform offers data management and targeting capabilities which enable B2B marketers to reach audiences through online display.

name: Oracle Data Cloud (BlueKai)
description: BlueKai is a data management platform, data exchange, and analytics system that allows 1st and 3rd party data providers to utilize their data effectively online.

name: Brand.net
description: Brand.net,a Valassis Digital company, is a leading ad network that uses precise targeting technology to deliver probability over possibility and action over exposure.

name: BrightRoll
description: BrightRoll offers innovative video advertising solutions – including proprietary ad serving and optimization, advanced audience targeting, standard-setting ad units and transparent reporting – to reach audiences across web, mobile and connected TV

name: Chango
description: Chango is a technology media company in the field of data-driven and programmatic digital advertising, specializing in search retargeting and programmatic marketing.

name: Collective
description: Collective specializes in delivering multiscreen solutions to advertisers and publishers.

name: comScore
description: comScore is a leading internet technology company that measures what people do as they navigate the digital world - and turns that information into insights and actions for our clients to maximize the value of their digital investments.
